text.p: MAI Systems Corp Thursday said it acquired the CIMPRO division of Oracle Corp's wholly owned subsidiary, Datalogix International Inc for $5.9 million in cash.
CIMPRO develops and markets process manufacturing Enterprise Resource Planning solutions for food, chemical and pharmaceutical manufacturers world-wide.
Process manufacturing generally involves the conversion of bulk raw materials into a finished, packaged, product, such as milk into cheese or chemicals into a pharmaceutical product.

In connection with the acquisition, MAI sid it had completed its previously announced financing with Canyon Capital Management LLP, pursuant to which it issued $6 million of its 11 percent notes due 2004 with warrants to purchase 750,000 shares of common stock at $8.
